Reason: The QUERY_CACHE_SIZE configuration option in the h2 software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value can have a significant impact on system performance. Increasing the QUERY_CACHE_SIZE can lead to improved query performance by reducing the need to re-execute queries, resulting in faster execution times and potentially lower memory consumption. On the other hand, decreasing the QUERY_CACHE_SIZE may result in more frequent query executions, leading to slower performance and higher memory usage. Therefore, the value of QUERY_CACHE_SIZE directly affects the overall system performance, making it a performance-sensitive configuration option.
